title: Advanced Music Education Design Project Utilizing Mobile Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Music theory, sheet music reading proficiency, and basic digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: An environment for graduate music education majors to conduct creative music production and analysis projects using mobile technology.

learning_goals: Independently complete music composition/arrangement projects using mobile applications at least three times
Produce two reports using mobile technology-based music analysis tools (e.g., Spectrogram, Tuner) through inquiry-based learning methods

Learners use supervised learning AI music generation tools (Soundraw, Amper Music, etc.) to comparatively analyze 3+ personal music styles (tempo, timbre, genre), create 10+ generated sample tracks, and write a 5-page comparative analysis report (including visual charts).

resources: Music Production Software (e.g., FL Studio Mobile)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
